item.description: Hello Hello $$ \sum_{x=1}^5 y^z $$ $$ \sum_{x=1}^5 y^z $$ $$ \sum_{x=1}^5 y^z $$ $$ \sum_{x=1}^5 y^z $$ ….

item.title: How to use my script
item.description: First of , for credits I’ve built this page using the tutorial found here at DZHG And using the Hyde theme from here Now here’s how to do it. Just fork my github repo, go to content/ folder and make a new note using whatevername as a .md file , dont worry you’ll be able to use latex inside it Like this $$\sum_{x=1}^5 y^z$$ and this \[\int_a^b f(x)\] ;) aight that was all.
